programme.desc: In this episode, we will discover that music helps us express our ideas and even our emotions. The rhythm, the melody, and harmony are the most important elements. Music can help us develop special skills such as: be persistent, be focused, it teaches us to communicate, share, and cooperate with other people. Music has the magic of uniting people because almost everyone shares a love for music!

programme.title: Mellodees - Pop Goes The Weasel - EP29
programme.desc: Do you know “Pop Goes the Weasel”? Join me and my pals as we play a game!

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy - Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy Ep14 - EP114
programme.desc: In a new spin-off series of mini-episodes - ‘Sunny Bunnies Get Busy’ - the characters are on hand to entertain and engage viewers in various colourful and creative activities and inspire children to 'Get Busy'.

programme.title: Giselle and the Green Team - The Case of the Pacific Palace - EP211
programme.desc: Gisele and her Green Team fight to stop the illegal dumping of trash in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S2 - Green Is the New Black / Plastic Bottle Island - EP222
programme.desc: Microfibres from Preston's new fashion line causes environmental problems in the ocean; a bottle-nosed dolphin gets a plastic six-pack ring stuck on its nose and mouth.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - Static Monstro-City / I-Yi-Yi Robot - EP117
programme.desc: When JD and Kent accidentally create a static electricity charged laundry monster, it rampages through town. With the help of Robert Van de Graaff they find a way to defeat the monster’s static cling. / When the Antimatters create a rogue robot, it’s up to the Secret Lab Kids to save the day.

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - To Herring is Human - EP117
programme.desc: While in Stockholm, Sweden during the Herring Festival, the Secret Millionaires Club drums up business for a small herring eatery called Dahlquist's which is run by Isak Dahlquist's family. The Secret Millionaires Club discover that Dahlquist's faces stiff competition from a fast food restaurant called the Happy Herring which is owned by Arnie Sr. Meanwhile, Jones and Radley learns about Bandy from Isak as they learn how do Bandy against Arnie Jr.'s team.

programme.title: Superhero Kindergarten - Emerson - EP126
programme.desc: A new exchange student from England teaches the Super Ks that appreciating each other's differences can save the day.

programme.title: Shaq's Garage - Whale of a Tale - EP118
programme.desc: An underwater treasure hunt quickly turns into a rescue operation.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal - The Pack: Part 2 - EP12
programme.desc: The story takes place in the distant future and focuses on a boy named Yuma Tsukumo, the number one bad boy at his school. Something unexpected happens when Ryoga challenges him to a Duel as the mysterious ghost of Astral appears before them, a new legend begins.

programme.title: Kidaverse Roblox Rumble - Kidaverse Roblox Rumble Ep5 - EP5
programme.desc: Eight kid gamers, ages eight to twelve, battle it out in ten different Roblox games to win prizes and find out who is the ultimate gamer! Video gamer, football star, and children’s book author Rashad Jennings hosts!

programme.title: Baby Einstein - Baby Einstein: Numbers Nursery
programme.desc: Between 12 and 24 months, little ones become increasingly interested in more complex ideas and begin to explore numbers and counting. Numbers Nursery™ introduces little ones to numerals 1 through 5 in a captivating, interactive way that invites them to join in, clap their hands and count out loud.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Manners when we travel - EP126
programme.desc: In this episode, Nova will take the viewers on a field trip through the different methods of travel. You should never leave your parents or the people you are travelling with! We will review some Planet Tools that will help us to make a calm trip inside the wagons of the train. The most important thing is not to reach the destination, but to enjoy the trip!

programme.title: Mellodees - ABC's Song - EP1
programme.desc: Learn the alphabet while you dance and sing-a-long with Dee!

programme.title: Giselle and the Green Team - The Case of the Pernicious Plan - EP212

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S2 - Calling Fowl / Treehouse Trouble - EP223
programme.desc: The Rangers discover Preston Praxton is feeding ducks to keep them off his golf course; Preston is harvesting trees so Patty can build her a massive dream tree house, but it is destroying the forest.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - Burpin’ Babies / Backpack Payback - EP118
programme.desc: Kent’s youth serum works a little too well and turns the gang into screaming babies. The serum soon wears off – sort of – now they’re adults trapped in baby bodies and Von Bolt doesn’t know whether to obey or burp them. / When the Anti-Matters steal JD's backpack and discover the portable ALVA, they unwittingly cause Edison's hologram to disappear. The Secret Lab Kids must concoct a plan to retrieve the backpack before Edison's lost forever.

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - Goooooal - EP118
programme.desc: The Secret Millionaires Club are in a race against the clock to save a local soccer team called the Swans from being sold. While improving the gameplay and the services at the arena, they receive help from one of Warren Buffett's friends named David Beeks who is a soccer player.

programme.title: Superhero Kindergarten - Emerson - EP126

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Baby Einstein - Baby Monet: Discovering the Seasons
programme.desc: As babies grow and change, so does the landscape around them. From fiery red leaves to falling snowflakes; from flowers in bloom to fireworks in July, every season of the year has its own magic just waiting to be discovered. BABY MONET takes little ones on a sight-and-sound-filled journey through spring, summer, fall and winter using puppet shows, images of nature, children, toys, and masterpieces by Claude Monet set to excerpts from composer Antonio Vivaldi's timeless "The Four Seasons."

programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

Now they must con and fight their way across the west through thousands of cavalry, lawmen, bounty hunters, and Indians to make their escape.

programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy
programme.desc: Ex-racer Bertie is facing financial issues with his car repair shop and go-kart track. He plans to participate in an upcoming 90’s race to solve his money problems, but he is suddenly asked by his ex-wife to take care of their son.

programme.title: Murder In Haute Provence
programme.desc: Two police officers investigate a body found in a slaughterhouse with the label “Can they suffer”. Although an animal rights association was initially suspected, details reveal that the victim was an undercover cop specialising in veterinary surveillance.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parent’s and Irene’s marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Cement
programme.desc: After waking in a hospital with no memory, Sarah Kohr is accused of shooting an innocent man following a violent accident. Determined to clear her name, she sets out to uncover the truth of what really happened that night.

programme.title: You Are Not Alone
programme.desc: When Eva returns to her house on the day of her divorce, she finds a bouquet of red roses outside the door. Attached is the note: "You are not alone." The sender is anonymous.

programme.title: I Want You
programme.desc: In this achingly melancholic sequel to Three Meters Above the Sky, Mario Casas is the soulful Hache, a man trying to forget his first love, Babi. When he meets Gin, he thinks he might love again. But a chance encounter with Babi shatters it all.

programme.title: Murder in Sainte Baume
programme.desc: Carel has returned to his native Provence. With his ex-schoolmate, today head of the local police, he investigates the death of a man killed by dozens of bee stings. Soon they uncover a horrific case from the past, one that had shaken the whole village.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.

programme.title: Here And There
programme.desc: Returning from the US, Pedro comes home to his family in Mexico. With the money he has made, he hopes to secure a better life with his family, mend his relationship with them, and hopes to achieve his lifelong dream of starting a band.

programme.title: Toubab
programme.desc: Soon after being released from prison, Babtou gets in trouble with the law again. Facing deportation to his foreign birthplace he’s never been to, he and his friend Dennis are willing to do anything to stay in the only home they've ever known: Frankfurt.

programme.title: GAADI - Children Of The Sun
programme.desc: Stripped of her Radala cast and forcibly married to an outcast by the monarch, a woman fights to keep her dignity by rejecting to succumb to her destiny.

programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.

programme.title: Red Eagle
programme.desc: A Summit between France, England, Portugal and the Pope is to take place in Spain, under the guise of looking for a solution to the conflict between Spain and Portugal; but the ulterior motive is to attack the Kingdom of Spain.

programme.title: Gluttony
programme.desc: Sakshi, Varun, and Saif appear to be entangled in a simple love triangle, but beneath the affair lies a sinister secret. Sakshi’s affair with Saif hides deeper horrors, as dark secrets between her and Varun surface.

programme.title: Abu Omar
programme.desc: Under a strict military curfew Salah, a grieving father, sets out on the road to cross the Israeli border carrying his dead son Omar in a duffel bag. Miri, a pregnant single woman, decides to help him out at all costs while fending off the terrible heat.
